stories.title: Project setup: Astro + Tailwind, Cloudflare config
stories.description: Initialize an Astro project with Tailwind CSS, configured for Cloudflare Pages deployment
acceptanceCriteria: npm run build succeeds without errors

stories.title: Homepage: hero, services grid, trust signals, CTA
stories.description: Build the homepage with all sections from scraped content including hero, services overview, trust signals, and call-to-action
acceptanceCriteria: Hero section with business name and tagline

stories.title: Services page
stories.description: Create a dedicated services page with detailed information about each service offering
acceptanceCriteria: Each service has name, description, and features

stories.title: About page
stories.description: Build the about page with business story, team information, and values

stories.title: Contact page: form, map, details
stories.description: Create contact page with working form, embedded map, and contact details
acceptanceCriteria: Contact form with name, email, phone, message fields
Form submits to Formspree or similar service
Google Maps embed with business location

stories.title: Design system: Apply vertical aesthetic
stories.description: Implement the design system specific to the business vertical with distinctive typography, colors, and styling
acceptanceCriteria: Display font and body font from design direction applied
Color palette implemented as CSS variables
Distinctive aesthetic - NOT generic (no Inter, Roboto)
Visual style matches the business vertical

stories.title: Motion & polish
stories.description: Add animations and polish including page load reveals, hover states, and smooth scrolling

stories.title: AEO: LocalBusiness schema, meta tags, FAQ
stories.description: Implement Answer Engine Optimization with structured data, meta tags, and FAQ section
acceptanceCriteria: LocalBusiness JSON-LD schema with all business details
Meta title and description optimized for local search

stories.title: Mobile responsive
stories.description: Ensure the site is fully responsive on mobile devices

stories.title: Performance: compress, lazy load, minify
stories.description: Optimize performance with image compression, lazy loading, and asset minification
acceptanceCriteria: CSS and JS minified in production

stories.title: Deploy to Cloudflare Pages
stories.description: Deploy the completed site to Cloudflare Pages
